mapper.insert: insert into tbl_bgm(id, video_id, video_title) values(#{id}, #{video_id}, #{video_title})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_bgm where id = #{id} order by video_id desc limit #{startPage}, #{endPage}
select count(*) from tbl_bgm where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_bgm where video_id = #{video_id} and id = #{id}
